article.title: Eyak Technology to Procure VSATS Under $43 Million Contract
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Eyak Technology LLC has bee awarded a $43 million contract for the Project Manager, Defense Wide Transmission Systems, under the auspices of the Project Management Office Defense Communication and Army Transmission Systems, to procure, deploy and maintain 970 Combat Service Support Very Small Aperture Terminals (VSATS).
